name: Earth Defender VR
description:
An alien ship has come to destroy Earth!

You are a Superior Space Being that can save the world. You must protect Earth from the alien weapons and destroy the alien ship by throwing meteors at it. 

MOVE WITH THE LEFT STICK

GRAB WITH THE GRIP BUTTONS

This is my second ever game jam. I spent around 7.5 hours making this project.

I'm slowly getting better at this game development thing :D
